org.wonderly.events
Class EventListener

java.lang.Object
  org.wonderly.events.EventListener
All Implemented Interfaces:
Serializable, Runnable, Remote, IEventListener, IEventSync
public class EventListener
extends Object
implements IEventListener, IEventSync, Runnable, Serializable, Remote

This class provides the remote, per connection implementation of the subscription mechanism. EventManager creates an instance of this class for each register'd subscriber.

Author:
Gregg Wonderly.
See Also:

setHighWater

public void setHighWater(int val)
Set the highwater mark for event discarding on slow links.

Parameters:
val - The maximum number of queued events, or 0 for no limit.

unsubscribe

public boolean unsubscribe(Subscription sub)
                    throws IOException
Description copied from interface: IEventListener
Unsubscribe from the passed subscription. The passed subscription information which may either deny reporting of a topic, or require reporting of a topic will be removed from the current subscription list.

Specified by:
unsubscribe in interface IEventListener
Returns:
true if found. false if topic was not found.

IOException
